fieldUpdates.name: Commercial Negoitation

fieldUpdates.name: Commercial Risk

fieldUpdates.formula:
IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Opportunity Details Captured", "Missing: "
&IF(ISBLANK( CloseDate) ,"Close Date-","")&" " &IF( NOT(IsClosed) && CloseDate< TODAY() ,"Expired Close Date-","")&" " &IF(Hidden_Has_Primary_Competitor__c = FALSE ,"Primary Competitor-","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK( KeyContact__c ),"Key Contact-","")&" " &IF(No_of_Products__c <1, "Products-","")&" " &IF( Push_Counter__c > 3 ,"Push Count above 4 -","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK( Monthly_Executive_Summary__c ), "Status Update-","")&" "
&IF(ISBLANK( TEXT( Closed_Reason__c )) ,"Closed Reason-","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK( Closed_Comments__c ) ,"Closed Comments-","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK( TEXT(LeadSource) ),"Lead Source-",""))
fieldUpdates.name: Data Quality Description

rules.description: 2014-04 APMS - Send Outbound Message to Tibco
2014-04 APMS - Send Outbound Message to Tibco

rules.fullName: APMS - Propose with Contract - Ariba Contract Integration
rules.description: 2014-04 APMS - Send Outbound Message to Tibco
2014-07 APMS - Send Outbound Message to Tibco
2014-09 APMS - This Outbound Message is used to test Production Firewall, as part of Go-Live preparation.
Update the Data Qualitiy hidden fields
Send an email alert to the Digital ID team when a new Opportunity is created with Digital ID in the name or as a Product Interested

rules.fullName: ECLM Blank Fields when recreating opportunities
rules.description: ECLM Project. Clear contract related fields for new/cloned/renewed/reviewed opportunities

rules.fullName: ECLM Blank fields when recreating opportunities 2
rules.description: ECLM Project. Clear contract related fields for new/cloned/renewed/reviewed opportunities.

ECLM Project - Outbound notification to Tibco for Ariba contract creation. Only fires when the Contract Questionnaire has been completed (Questionnaire status = 'Contract Required' and 'Opportunity Id for Contract' matches - to avoid firing on clones).
rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(ECLM_Questionnaire_Status__c, 'Contract Required'), (ECLM_Opportunity_Id_for_Contract__c = CASESAFEID(Id)), IsAPMSApplication__c = false )

rules.fullName: ECLM clear closed reason for renewal
rules.description: ECLM clear the closed reason

rules.fullName: ECLM set review date changed to true
rules.description: ECLM: Set the Review Date Changed field to true when it is changed by integration.
Send an email to the Lead submitter when the Opportunity is Closed Won - unless it is a DoV or Renewal

rules.fullName: New Opportunity Owner from Lead Conversion
rules.description: This workflow will send an email to the new Opportunity Owner after a Lead has been converted.
rules.formula: OR(AND(CreatedById <> OwnerId, Lead_ID__c <> "" , Locally_Managed__c = FALSE, DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate) = DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)), AND(CreatedById <> OwnerId, Lead_ID__c <> "" , AND(Locally_Managed__c = TRUE , OR( Opportunity_Initial_Estimate__c > 5000, Account.OwnerId <> "00590000000im7B")), DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate) = DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))

rules.description: Check roll up summary field Product Count to see if Offering should be changed.
Clear the approval flag on change of the owner.
Phase 1: Populate Organisation Sector by workflow for sharing rules
Un-check Acknowledgement on Opportunity, when an Opportunity is re-opened
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( StageName ) , "Closed Won"))

rules.fullName: Phase 2 - Copy Today to the hidden field
rules.description: So that the field can be used in integration

rules.fullName: Phase 2 - update hidden fields with long text field values and data score
rules.description: These hidden fields will be used in the data scoring formulas as the long text fields cannot be used.
This workflow is used to populate the EoFY days & Modified Contract Start Date fields which is used for reporting. This a workflow due to the size of the formula requirements
Increment the Push Counter field by 1
rules.formula: IF( CloseDate > PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ), IF (MONTH(CloseDate) <> MONTH(PRIORVALUE( CloseDate )) , TRUE, FALSE), FALSE)
